metadata.title: CVE-2013-1841 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Net-Server, when the reverse-lookups option is enabled, does not check ifthe hostname resolves to the source IP address, which might allow remoteattackers to bypass ACL restrictions via the hostname parameter.

criterions.comment: libnet-server-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
